description: {"blocks":[{"key":"3p54p","text":"2023 NUS-Singapore iGEM team followed this protocol to prepare a 1% agarose gel. The team used this 1% agarose gel to isolate the DNA fragments from the common PCR and the colony PCR products. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4eg5j","text":"For a 1% agarose gel, mix the following in a conical flask: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ei3l8","text":"  of Agarose powder.  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4j1bu","text":"  of 1x TAE buffer (Tris-Acetate-EDTA Buffer).   ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4fmvp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5tig","text":"Swirl the agarose solution to mix it well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6cmaj","text":"Heat the agarose solution in a microwave until it boils.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8f1pu","text":"Take out the conical flask from the microwave and swirl the conical flask until the agarose solution is clear and without undissolved agarose powder or lumps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4h641","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dii88","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"60ojn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"safety","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7h31c","text":"Wear thermal gloves when handling the hot conical flask from the microwave to prevent burns.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"au8i6","text":"Add   of Ultra GelRed gel stain into the agarose solution and swirl the conical flask until the colour becomes uniform.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"75pk4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"42et9","text":"Secure a gel tray tightly onto a gel caster and place an 8-well comb or 15-well comb into the tray.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6iudt","text":"Pour the agarose solution into the tray, ensuring that there are no bubbles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"866m7","text":"Cool down the agarose solution for at least   to get a solidified agarose gel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bhq01","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

title: Preparation of Agarose Gel
warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"2iou6","text":"Proper lab PPE must be worn at all times while preparing the agarose gel. Additionally, thermal gloves designed for high-temperature protection must be worn when handling the hot agarose solution after microwaving.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
